PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.RESPONSIBLE_PARTY_INTRO: The party responsible in terms of data protection laws, particularly the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS_INTRO: You can exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided for our data protection officer:
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM1: Information about your data stored by us and its processing (Art. 15 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM2: Correction of inaccurate personal data (Art. 16 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM3: Deletion of your data stored by us (Art. 17 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM4: Restriction of data processing, provided we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM5: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR), and
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM6: Data portability, provided you have consented to data processing or concluded a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONSENT_REVOCATION: If you have given us your consent, you can withdraw it at any time with effect for the future.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COMPLAINT_AUTHORITY: You can always contact a supervisory authority with a complaint, e.g., the competent supervisory authority of your federal state of residence or the authority responsible for us as the responsible body.
PRIVACY_POLICY.AUTHORITY_LIST_INTRO: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) with addresses can be found at:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_TITLE: Collection of general information when visiting our website
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH1: When you access our website, i.e., if you do not register or otherwise transmit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes, for example, the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address, and similar.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH2: It is processed in particular for the following purposes:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM1: Ensuring a problem-free connection to the website,
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM2: Ensuring smooth use of our website,
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM3: Evaluation of system security and stability, and
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM4: for the optimization of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH3: We do not use your data to draw conclusions about your person. Information of this kind is statistically evaluated by us anonymously, if necessary, to optimize our internet presence and the technology behind it.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH1: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR on the basis of our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_RECIPIENT_PARAGRAPH1: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH1: The data will be deleted as soon as they are no longer required for the purpose of their collection. This is generally the case for data used to provide the website when the respective session has ended.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH2: In the case of data storage in log files, this is the case after 14 days at the latest. Storage beyond this is possible. In this case, the IP addresses of the users are anonymized, so that an assignment of the calling client is no longer possible.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PROVISION_REQUIRED_PARAGRAP: The provision of the aforementioned personal data is neither legally nor contractually required. However, without the IP address, the service and functionality of our website cannot be guaranteed. In addition, individual services may not be available or may be restricted. For this reason, an objection is excluded.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_PARAGRAPH1: The data you enter will be stored for the purpose of individual communication with you. For this, a valid e-mail address and your name are required. This serves to assign the request and subsequently answer it. The provision of further data is optional.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH1: The processing of the data entered into the contact form is carried out on the basis of a legitimate interest (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH2: By providing the contact form, we want to enable you to contact us easily. Your information will be stored for the purpose of processing the request and for possible follow-up questions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH3: If you contact us to request an offer, the data entered into the contact form will be processed for the purpose of carrying out pre-contractual measures (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_RECIPIENT_PARAGRAPH1: Recipients of the data may be processors.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH1: Data will be deleted at the latest 6 months after processing the request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH2: If a contractual relationship arises, we are subject to the statutory retention periods according to HGB and will delete your data after these periods have expired.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_PROVISION_REQUIRED_PARAGRAP: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. However, we can only process your request if you provide us with your name, your e-mail address and the reason for the request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_TITLE: Use of script libraries (Google Web Fonts)
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_PARAGRAPH1: To display our content correctly and graphically appealing across browsers, we use “Google Web Fonts” from Google LLC (1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA; hereinafter “Google”) on this website for the display of fonts.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_PARAGRAPH2_PART1: Further information on Google Web Fonts can be found at
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART1: On this website, we use the Google Maps service. Google Maps is operated by Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA (hereinafter “Google”). This allows us to display interactive maps directly on the website and enables you to conveniently use the map function.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART2: Further information about data processing by Google can be found in Google's privacy policy:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART3: There you can also change your personal data protection settings in the data protection center.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH2_PART1: Detailed instructions on managing your own data in connection with Google products can be found here:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH3: By visiting the website, Google receives information that you have accessed the corresponding subpage of our website. This occurs regardless of whether Google provides a user account through which you are logged in, or whether no user account exists. If you are logged in to Google, your data will be directly assigned to your account.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH4: If you do not wish the assignment in your profile on Google, you must log out of Google before activating the button. Google stores your data as usage profiles and uses them for purposes of advertising, market research and/or needs-based design of its websites. Such an evaluation takes place in particular (even for users who are not logged in) to provide needs-based advertising and to inform other users of the social network about your activities on our website. You have a right to object to the creation of these user profiles, whereby you must contact Google to exercise this right.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_CONSENT_REVOCATION_PARAGRAPH: The provider currently does not offer an option for easy opt-out or blocking of data transmission. If you want to prevent tracking of your activities on our website, please revoke your consent for the corresponding cookie category or all technically unnecessary cookies and data transmissions in the cookie consent tool. In this case, however, you may not be able to use our website or only to a limited extent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SSL_ENCRYPTION_PARAGRAPH1: To protect the security of your data during transmission, we use encryption methods (e.g., SSL) corresponding to the current state of the art via HTTPS.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_TITLE: Information about your right to object according to Art. 21 GDPR
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_PARAGRAPH1: You have the right, for reasons arising from your particular situation, to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you, which is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (data processing on the basis of a balancing of interests); this also applies to profiling based on this provision within the meaning of Art. 4 No. 4 GDPR.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_PARAGRAPH2: If you object, we will no longer process your personal data unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing that override your interests, rights and freedoms, or the processing serves the assertion, exercise or defense of legal claims.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CHANGES_PARAGRAPH1: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy so that it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy then applies to your renewed visit.
PRIVACY_POLICY.QUESTIONS_TITLE: Questions to the data protection officer
PRIVACY_POLICY.QUESTIONS_PARAGRAPH1: If you have any questions about data protection, please send us an e-mail or contact the person responsible for data protection in our organization directly:
PRIVACY_POLICY.FOOTNOTE_PART1: The privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind AG, the experts for

ABOUT_ME.MAIN_TEXT: I love IT because it lets me solve real-world problems with code. Building apps from scratch makes me happy.
ABOUT_ME.LOCATION_TEXT: I am based in Berlin and Dresden and am very open to remote work.
ABOUT_ME.EDUCATION_TEXT: I’m passionate about exploring new technologies and learning new skills.
ABOUT_ME.PROBLEM_SOLVING_TEXT: I tackle challenges step by step: during my Physics studies I learned to solve complex problems with perseverance.

CONTACT.BODY_TEXT_PART1: Feel free to reach out if you’re looking for someone who’s eager to learn, works meticulously, and thrives in a team.
CONTACT.BODY_TEXT_PART2: I’m passionate about crafting clean, user-friendly interfaces and adding real value to your projects.

FORM.PRIVACY_CONSENT_PART2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_INTRO: Here is a selection of my work – please explore them in action.

PROJECT_1.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

PROJECT_2.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

PROJECT_3.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Lieferando-style food ordering platform. It lets you browse menus from multiple local restaurants, customize your dishes and place orders in just a few clicks.

REFERENCES.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

REFERENCE_1.TEXT: Cecilia demonstrated team and problem-solving skills with a self-motivated attitude to learn new programs. She was able to carry forth the project.
REFERENCE_1.AUTHOR: Uni. Prof. Dr. A. Niendorf

REFERENCE_2.TEXT: Ms. Diesch showed a high level of commitment in all areas of responsibility and a very quick grasp.
REFERENCE_2.AUTHOR: A. Martin

REFERENCE_3.TEXT: She has been an indispensable part of our team. Her loyalty and highly motivating kind helped through many processes as well as her courage of trying out the unknown.
REFERENCE_3.AUTHOR: M. Lederer

REFERENCE_4.TEXT: Ms. Diesch worked very conscientiously and as a team player. We got to know her as a friendly employee and would hire her again at any time.
REFERENCE_4.AUTHOR: Prof. Dr. med. P. Ghadjar

REFERENCE_5.TEXT: I particularly appreciate Cecilia’s resilience and her ability to keep an overview even under pressure.
REFERENCE_5.AUTHOR: P. Wagner

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: This is an overview of my front-end toolkit. Until now, I mainly worked on JavaScript/TypeScript in Angular, backed by Firebase and GitHub.
SKILLS.NOTE: Feel free to reach out—I’m always open to learn new technologies and frameworks.
